speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report by Francisca Pleguezuelos Aguilar, on behalf of the Committee on Regional Development, on the impact and effects of structural policies on EU cohesion [ 2006/2181(INI) ] ( A6-0150/2007 ).
original: President. The next item is the report by Francisca Pleguezuelos Aguilar, on behalf of the Committee on Regional Development, on the impact and effects of structural policies on EU cohesion [ 2006/2181(INI) ] ( A6-0150/2007 ).
